snippet: The start-up Art.sy aims to do for visual art what Pandora did for music: become a source of discovery, pleasure and education.
abstract: Art.sy, an extensive free repository of fine art images that features an algorithmic recommendation engine, launches; site aims to do for visual art what Pandora and other streaming services have done for music: become a source of discovery, pleasure and education.
lead_paragraph: The start-up Art.sy aims to do for visual art what Pandora did for music: become a source of discovery, pleasure and education.

headline.seo: Art.sy Is Mapping the World of Art on the Web
headline.main: Online, a Genome Project for the World of Art
headline.print_headline: Online, a Genome Project for the World of Art
